text: I waited 20 min. Bc they gave my order to the people that ordered after me. They would not take my$50 bill. I was the 2nd person in there out of 7 . I got mine last. What happened to hot n ready? All 7 people had to wait 5-10 min. Worst little Caesar's I've been to.
